Spells:
Color Spray (W1 Illu): R15' Cone renders creatures with 2/4/any HD unconscious for 2d4 rd/blind for 1d4 rd/stunned for 1 rd (DC 12 Will neg)
Detect Poison (W0 Divi): R45' Self detects poison in target, DC 20 Wis or Alchemy check for type
Detect Scrying (W4 Divi): R40' Self detects scrying and makes opposed caster check to see source for 1 dy
False Life (W2 Necr): Self gains 1d10+8 temporary HP for 8 hr
Fire Shield (W4 Evoc): Cold or hot flames enveloping self inflict 1d6+8 HP upon foe hit, reduce heat or cold damage by half (DC 15 Ref no HP) for 8 rd
Flare (W0 Evoc): R45' Target dazzled (DC 11 Fort neg) for 1 min
Gaseous Form (W3 Tran): Touched becomes insubstantial (DR 10/magic, immune to poison and critical hits, unable to use spell components, fly 10') for 16 min
Ghoul Touch (W2 Necr): Touched becomes paralyzed for 1d6+2 rd and stench sickens in 10' radius (DC 17 Fort neg)
Glitterdust (W2 Conj): R180' Creatures in 10' radius outlined and blind for 8 rd (DC 13 Will outlined only)
Grease (W1 Conj): R45' Object or 10' sq becomes slippery, causing falls (DC 12 Ref DC 10 Balance for half speed), for 8 rd
Hold Portal (W1 Abju): R180' Door, gate, or window magically held shut for 8 min
Invisibility Sphere (W3 Illu): Creatures in 10' radius of touched become invisible for 8 min or until attack or leave area
Locate Object (W2 Divi): Self senses direction of object or type in 720' radius for 8 min
Magic Circle Against Law (W3 Abju): 10' radius from touched gives +2 AC and saves, suppresses mental control, bars contact and entry (SR neg) by nonchaotic summoned creatures for 80 min
Magic Weapon (W1 Tran): Touched weapon gains +1 attack and damage for 8 min
Nystul's Magic Aura (W1 Illu): Alters aura of up to 40 lb object for 8 dy
Prestidigitation (W0 Univ): R10' Self performs minor tricks for 1 hr
Protection From Energy (W3 Abju): Touched gains resistance 96 to chosen energy for 80 min
Protection From Evil (W1 Abju): Touched gains +2 AC and saves, suppresses mental control, and bars contact by nongood summoned creatures for 8 min
Read Magic (W0 Divi): Self reads magical writing for 80 min
Reduce Person (W1 Tran): R45' Target humanoid becomes half size (-2 Strength, +2 Dexterity, +1 attack, +1 AC) (DC 12 Fort neg) for 8 min
Remove Curse (W4 Abju): Dispels all curses from touched
Shield (W1 Abju): Self gains +4 AC and immunity to Magic Missile for 8 min
Magic Notes:
Greater Spell Focus (Necromancy): +3 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Intelligence Wizard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level W1
Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Spellcasting Prodigy (Wizard): +1 spell DC/+2 intelligence for bonus spells
Craft Wondrous Item: May create and mend miscellaneous magic items
Create Portal: Create magical portal
Delay Spell: Delay effect of spell 1-5 rd
Extend Spell: May use +1 spell slot to dbl chosen spell duration
Greater Spell Penetration: +2 checks to overcome spell resistance
Improved Counterspell: May counterspell using a higher-level spell from same school
Innate Spell: Designated spells as spell-like ability 1/rd uses +8 spell slot
Insidious Magic: DC 9+foe level check to detect Weave magic, foe DC 19 check to detect Shadow Weave spell
Magical Artisan: Reduce item creation base price by 25%
Pernicious Magic: Weave foes DC 19 check to counterspell, DC 9+foe level to counterspell Weave foes
Persistent Spell: Fixed-range spell lasts 24 hr
Quicken Spell: May use +4 spell slot to cast chosen spell as a free action 1/rd
Scribe Scroll: May create scroll of any known spell
Shadow Weave Magic: +1 DC and resistance checks on enchantment, illusion, necromancy, and darkness descriptor spells, -1 caster level on evocation and transmutation, no light descriptor spells
Signature Spell: Convert arcane spells into specified mastered spell
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Spell Mastery: May prepare 1 spells w/out spellbook
Spell Penetration: +2 checks to overcome spell resistance
Still Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out movement
Tenacious Magic: Weave foes DC 23 to dispel, DC 13+foe level to dispel Weave foes
Twin Spell: Affect as two spells uses +4 spell slot

Familiar: Hawk "Zesjarga"

HD/HP: 8/18 Init: +3 AC: 21 Attack: +9 1d4-2 Fort/Ref/Will: +2/+5/+8
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Share Spells; Speak With Like Animals; Speak With Master
Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: May deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: May share emotions up to 1 mile
Share Spells: Master may share self spell w/adjacent companion
Speak With Like Animals: May talk w/similar creatures
Speak With Master: May talk w/master in secret language
